categories: Category:Cut content from Star Wars: The Old Republic
Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Ehla Mi was a female Rutian Twi'lek Jedi Master of the Jedi Order. She was stationed on Quesh during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. There she taught Republic citizens how to create artifacts and relics.
Ehla Mi appears only in the game files for Star Wars: The Old Republic as her character was cut from the game. Ehla Mi's file can be found on Jedipedia.
